meanings.definition: A comprehensive reference work containing articles on a wide range of subjects.
meanings.sent1: I found the cyclopedia in the library very helpful for my research project.
meanings.sent2: The cyclopedia on my bookshelf covers topics from history to science.
meanings.sent3: When I dropped the cyclopedia, it opened to a page about famous inventors.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a cyclopedia, full of knowledge waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent5: The cyclopedia was a treasure trove of information, like a map to the world's knowledge.

meanings.definition: A book or set of books containing information on all branches of knowledge.
meanings.sent1: My grandfather's cyclopedia collection includes books on art, literature, and geography.
meanings.sent2: The cyclopedia set on the shelf is a valuable resource for students.
meanings.sent3: The cyclopedia fell off the table, and all the pages scattered like autumn leaves.
meanings.sent4: In her eyes, the cyclopedia was a gateway to endless learning possibilities.
meanings.sent5: As a child, I would get lost in the cyclopedia, exploring different worlds through its pages.
